Get the Web Tracker SDK
arrow_forward_ios

Get the Web Tracker SDK

To get started, you can download the web tracker SDK from here.

Download SDK (v1.2.0)

The zip file contains the following:

web-tracker-1.2.0.js

The core SDK file to be embedded in your website.

README.md

Instructions on how to use the SDK.

example.html

A complete example demonstrating the SDK functionality.

Before embedding the SDK into your website, make sure you have your tracker ID.

arrow_back_ios
PREVIOUS
Getting started
NEXT
Embed & Configure the SDK
arrow_forward_ios

Embed & Configure the SDK

Follow these steps to integrate the Web Tracker SDK into your website.

1. Include the SDK Script

First, you need to include the Web Tracker SDK script in your website's HTML. Place the following script tag in the `` section of your HTML file. This will load the SDK and make it available for use. 

<script src="web-tracker-1.2.0.js"></script>

2. Initialize the SDK

Next, initialize the SDK by creating a new `WebTracker` instance. You'll need to provide your unique tracker ID and other configuration options. This should be done in a script tag in the `` of your HTML, after the SDK script has been included. 


const tracker = new WebTracker({
    trackerId: 'example',
    apiEndpoint: 'https://ingestor.revosurge-dev.com/collect',
    enabled: true,
    autoTrack: true,
    geo: true
});

Parameters

Name Type Description
trackerId string

Identifier assigned to your RevoSurge tracker.

apiEndpoint string

Destination URL that receives tracking payloads.

enabled boolean

Set to false to prevent the SDK from sending data.

autoTrack boolean

Disable automatic event collection by switching to false.

geo boolean

Enable to prompt end users for geolocation consent.

Trigger tracking events
arrow_forward_ios

Trigger tracking events

The SDK captures a baseline of behavior automatically and gives you hooks for the key business milestones you want to measure.

Automatic events tracking

With autoTrack enabled, these events fire without additional code and provide a complete journey timeline.

unique_visitor

Logged once per device within a 24 hour window to help you track reach.

page_view

Sent whenever a route changes so funnels reflect precise navigation.

click

Captures click interactions for any element decorated with data-rs-track.

scroll

Triggers after readers cross 50% viewport depth, useful for engagement KPIs.

form_submit

Tracks every form completion and includes form identifiers for attribution.

page_hidden

Dispatched when a tab goes to the background, revealing drop-off points.

page_visible

Fires as soon as the page regains focus to measure user returns.

session_end

Emitted after a period of inactivity to close out session analytics cleanly.

Manual events tracking

There are also predefined user events to log business-specific milestones:

Event register


tracker.track('register', {
    user_id: 'user_123',
    identifier: 'hash-of-email-or-phone',
    plan: 'pro',
    metadata: {
        referrer: 'pricing-page'
    }
});

REGISTER

Parameter Type Required Description
user_id string Required

Primary identifier issued once the user has an account in your system.

identifier string Optional

Hashed email or phone captured pre-signup to aid identity stitching.

Event download_click


tracker.track('download_click', {
    store_type: 'play_store'
});

DOWNLOAD_CLICK

Parameter Type Required Description
store_type string Optional

Channel where the download happened, e.g. app_store, play_store.

Event login


tracker.track('login', {
    user_id: 'user_123'
});

LOGIN

Parameter Type Required Description
user_id string Required

User ID used to authenticate and resume a session.

Event deposit


tracker.track('deposit', {
    currency: 'USDT',
    network: 'TRON',
    amount: 250.5
});

DEPOSIT

Parameter Type Required Description
currency string Required

Currency used for the funding action, e.g. USDT.

network string Required

Blockchain or payment network, e.g. TRON, ETH.

amount number Required

Numeric value of the deposit denominated in the selected currency.

Event enter_game


tracker.track('enter_game', {
    currency: 'USDT',
    game_id: 'game_42',
    game_provider: 'Galactic Studios'
});

ENTER_GAME

Parameter Type Required Description
currency string Required

Currency selected for gameplay transactions.

game_id string Required

Internal identifier for the game title.

game_provider string Required

Name of the partner studio or provider.
